Articles.Content:
Thanks whiteowl for this challenge! your a cool guy too love your LPs!

Ok first go to the moon(For the people who did not go to the moon without a plane!)

then deploy a sattilite and let it orbit the moon then land on the moon with your plane try to point straight down =P then pull up all the way and land with all the speed Good luck even tho i diidn\'t try it! It will work nothings impossible

I apologize, but I can\'t really understand this well. Allow me:

This challenge requires a spaceplane! All non-spaceplane entries are invalid, though sucessful missions are still impressive.

Part 1: Fly to the Mun, and get into an orbit around it.

Part 2: Detach your sattelite and observe it as it makes at least one orbit.

Part 3: Now, attempt a nose-down landing on the Mun.

Part 4: Return to Kerbin, and land safely.

[i had to modify the challenge a bit, as it\'s impossible to pull out of a dive at the last second on the Mun-- no atmosphere, so wings don\'t actually work...]
ph thanks for making it readable! i\'ve to channge it 8)
I\'m flattered... but not entirely sure what I had to do with anything here. Good luck with landing on your nose! Take screenshots.

I\'m flattered... but not entirely sure what I had to do with anything here. Good luck with landing on your nose! Take screenshots.

youdid it in youre lp

Land on your nose?

What do you mean by that?

I dont think you can land on your nose in a plane without braking it

but I landed on the mun in a spaceplane if you are intrested in the (Kind of) LP here
